name: ragstack-lambda
description: Serverless OCR-to-Knowledge Base pipeline on AWS

scripts.lint:backend: uv run ruff check . --fix && uv run ruff format .
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend:coverage && cd src/ui && npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:all: npm run lint && npm run test
